name: Mango BBQ Soy Curls or BBQ Jackfruit Tacos
description: Mango BBQ Soy Curls or Jackfruit Tacos. Shredded Soy Curls or Jackfruit make a an amazing carrier for bbq sauce. Some Mango or other fruit puree takes it to the next level. Serve in sandwiches or tacos with slaw. Vegan Gluten-free Recipe No Added Oil
recipeIngredient: 1/4 cup mango puree (or more bbq sauce)
a dash of cayenne to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Soak the soy curls in warm water for 10 mins. Squeeze to remove excess moisture.
recipeInstructions.name: Soak the soy curls in warm water for 10 mins. Squeeze to remove excess moisture.

recipeInstructions.text: Add to a food processor with onion and garlic and pulse to shred evenly
recipeInstructions.name: Add to a food processor with onion and garlic and pulse to shred evenly

recipeInstructions.text: Transfer to a bowl. Add the spices and sauce and mix well.  Add a tbsp or so water if the mango puree was too thick and mix in. You want the mixture to be saucy.
recipeInstructions.name: Transfer to a bowl. Add the spices and sauce and mix well.  Add a tbsp or so water if the mango puree was too thick and mix in. You want the mixture to be saucy.

recipeInstructions.text: Spread on parchment lined baking sheet.
recipeInstructions.name: Spread on parchment lined baking sheet.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake at 400 degrees F for 30 mins or longer until texture is to preference. Move the mix around mid way through baking.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake at 400 degrees F for 30 mins or longer until texture is to preference. Move the mix around mid way through baking.

recipeInstructions.text: Serve over slaw. with additional bbq sauce or vegan ranch in tacos or buns.
recipeInstructions.name: Serve over slaw. with additional bbq sauce or vegan ranch in tacos or buns.
